text: For all that is in the world, the lust of the flesh, the lust of the eyes, and the pride of life, isn"t the Father"s, but is the world"s.

name: 1 John 2:17
text: The world is passing away with its lusts, but he who does God"s will remains forever.

name: 1 John 2:18
text: Little children, these are the end times, and as you heard that the Antichrist is coming, even now many antichrists have arisen. By this we know that it is the final hour.

name: 1 John 2:19
text: They went out from us, but they didn"t belong to us; for if they had belonged to us, they would have continued with us. But they left, that they might be revealed that none of them belong to us.

name: 1 John 2:20
text: You have an anointing from the Holy One, and you all have knowledge.

name: 1 John 2:21
text: I have not written to you because you don"t know the truth, but because you know it, and because no lie is of the truth.

name: 1 John 2:22
text: Who is the liar but he who denies that Jesus is the Christ? This is the Antichrist, he who denies the Father and the Son.

name: 1 John 2:23
text: Whoever denies the Son, the same doesn"t have the Father. He who confesses the Son has the Father also.

name: 1 John 2:24
text: Therefore, as for you, let that remain in you which you heard from the beginning. If that which you heard from the beginning remains in you, you also will remain in the Son, and in the Father.

name: 1 John 2:25
text: This is the promise which he promised us, the eternal life.

name: 1 John 2:26
text: These things I have written to you concerning those who would lead you astray.

name: 1 John 2:27
text: As for you, the anointing which you received from him remains in you, and you don"t need for anyone to teach you. But as his anointing teaches you concerning all things, and is true, and is no lie, and even as it taught you, you will remain in him.

name: 1 John 2:28
text: Now, little children, remain in him, that when he appears, we may have boldness, and not be ashamed before him at his coming.

name: 1 John 2:29
text: If you know that he is righteous, you know that everyone who practices righteousness is born of him.

name: 1 John 3:1
text: Behold, how great a love the Father has bestowed on us, that we should be called children of God! For this cause the world doesn"t know us, because it didn"t know him.

name: 1 John 3:2
text: Beloved, now we are children of God, and it is not yet revealed what we will be. But we know that, when he is revealed, we will be like him; for we will see him just as he is.

name: 1 John 3:3
text: Everyone who has this hope set on him purifies himself, even as he is pure.

name: 1 John 3:4
text: Everyone who sins also commits lawlessness. Sin is lawlessness.

name: 1 John 3:5
text: You know that he was revealed to take away our sins, and in him is no sin.

name: 1 John 3:6
text: Whoever remains in him doesn"t sin. Whoever sins hasn"t seen him, neither knows him.

name: 1 John 3:7
text: Little children, let no one lead you astray. He who does righteousness is righteous, even as he is righteous.

name: 1 John 3:8
text: He who sins is of the devil, for the devil has been sinning from the beginning. To this end the Son of God was revealed, that he might destroy the works of the devil.

name: 1 John 3:9
text: Whoever is born of God doesn"t commit sin, because his seed remains in him; and he can"t sin, because he is born of God.

name: 1 John 3:10
text: In this the children of God are revealed, and the children of the devil. Whoever doesn"t do righteousness is not of God, neither is he who doesn"t love his brother.

name: 1 John 3:11
text: For this is the message which you heard from the beginning, that we should love one another;

name: 1 John 3:12
text: unlike Cain, who was of the evil one, and killed his brother. Why did he kill him? Because his works were evil, and his brother"s righteous.

name: 1 John 3:13
text: Don"t be surprised, my brothers, if the world hates you.

name: 1 John 3:14
text: We know that we have passed out of death into life, because we love the brothers. He who doesn"t love his brother remains in death.

name: 1 John 3:15
text: Whoever hates his brother is a murderer, and you know that no murderer has eternal life remaining in him.

name: 1 John 3:16
text: By this we know love, because he laid down his life for us. And we ought to lay down our lives for the brothers.

name: 1 John 3:17
text: But whoever has the world"s goods, and sees his brother in need, and closes his heart of compassion against him, how does the love of God remain in him?

name: 1 John 3:18
text: My little children, let"s not love in word only, neither with the tongue only, but in deed and truth.

name: 1 John 3:19
text: And by this we know that we are of the truth, and persuade our hearts before him,

name: 1 John 3:20
text: because if our heart condemns us, God is greater than our heart, and knows all things.

name: 1 John 3:21
text: Beloved, if our hearts don"t condemn us, we have boldness toward God;

name: 1 John 3:22
text: and whatever we ask, we receive from him, because we keep his commandments and do the things that are pleasing in his sight.

name: 1 John 3:23
text: This is his commandment, that we should believe in the name of his Son, Jesus Christ, and love one another, even as he commanded.

name: 1 John 3:24
text: He who keeps his commandments remains in him, and he in him. By this we know that he remains in us, by the Spirit which he gave us.

name: 1 John 4:1
text: Beloved, don"t believe every spirit, but test the spirits, whether they are of God, because many false prophets have gone out into the world.

name: 1 John 4:2
text: By this you know the Spirit of God: every spirit who confesses that Jesus Christ has come in the flesh is of God,

name: 1 John 4:3
text: and every spirit who doesn"t confess that Jesus Christ has come in the flesh is not of God, and this is the spirit of the Antichrist, of whom you have heard that it comes. Now it is in the world already.

name: 1 John 4:4
text: You are of God, little children, and have overcome them; because greater is he who is in you than he who is in the world.

name: 1 John 4:5
text: They are of the world. Therefore they speak of the world, and the world hears them.

name: 1 John 4:6
text: We are of God. He who knows God listens to us. He who is not of God doesn"t listen to us. By this we know the spirit of truth, and the spirit of error.

name: 1 John 4:7
text: Beloved, let us love one another, for love is of God; and everyone who loves is born of God, and knows God.

name: 1 John 4:8
text: He who doesn"t love doesn"t know God, for God is love.

name: 1 John 4:9
text: By this God"s love was revealed in us, that God has sent his one and only Son into the world that we might live through him.

name: 1 John 4:10
text: In this is love, not that we loved God, but that he loved us, and sent his Son as the atoning sacrifice for our sins.

name: 1 John 4:11
text: Beloved, if God loved us in this way, we also ought to love one another.

name: 1 John 4:12
text: No one has seen God at any time. If we love one another, God remains in us, and his love has been perfected in us.

name: 1 John 4:13
text: By this we know that we remain in him and he in us, because he has given us of his Spirit.

name: 1 John 4:14
text: We have seen and testify that the Father has sent the Son as the Savior of the world.

name: 1 John 4:15
text: Whoever confesses that Jesus is the Son of God, God remains in him, and he in God.

name: 1 John 4:16
text: We know and have believed the love which God has for us. God is love, and he who remains in love remains in God, and God remains in him.

name: 1 John 4:17
text: In this love has been made perfect among us, that we may have boldness in the day of judgment, because as he is, even so are we in this world.

name: 1 John 4:18
text: There is no fear in love; but perfect love casts out fear, because fear has punishment. He who fears is not made perfect in love.

name: 1 John 4:19
text: We love him, because he first loved us.

name: 1 John 4:20
text: If a man says, "I love God," and hates his brother, he is a liar; for he who doesn"t love his brother whom he has seen, how can he love God whom he has not seen?

name: 1 John 4:21
text: This commandment we have from him, that he who loves God should also love his brother.

name: 1 John 5:1
text: Whoever believes that Jesus is the Christ is born of God. Whoever loves the Father also loves the child who is born of him.

name: 1 John 5:2
text: By this we know that we love the children of God, when we love God and keep his commandments.

name: 1 John 5:3
text: For this is the love of God, that we keep his commandments. His commandments are not grievous.

name: 1 John 5:4
text: For whatever is born of God overcomes the world. This is the victory that has overcome the world: your faith.

name: 1 John 5:5
text: Who is he who overcomes the world, but he who believes that Jesus is the Son of God?

name: 1 John 5:6
text: This is he who came by water and blood, Jesus Christ; not with the water only, but with the water and the blood. It is the Spirit who testifies, because the Spirit is the truth.

name: 1 John 5:7
text: For there are three who testify:

name: 1 John 5:8
text: the Spirit, the water, and the blood; and the three agree as one.

name: 1 John 5:9
text: If we receive the witness of men, the witness of God is greater; for this is God"s testimony which he has testified concerning his Son.

name: 1 John 5:10
text: He who believes in the Son of God has the testimony in himself. He who doesn"t believe God has made him a liar, because he has not believed in the testimony that God has given concerning his Son.

name: 1 John 5:11
text: The testimony is this, that God gave to us eternal life, and this life is in his Son.

name: 1 John 5:12
text: He who has the Son has the life. He who doesn"t have God"s Son doesn"t have the life.

name: 1 John 5:13
text: These things I have written to you who believe in the name of the Son of God, that you may know that you have eternal life, and that you may continue to believe in the name of the Son of God.

name: 1 John 5:14
text: This is the boldness which we have toward him, that, if we ask anything according to his will, he listens to us.

name: 1 John 5:15
text: And if we know that he listens to us, whatever we ask, we know that we have the petitions which we have asked of him.

name: 1 John 5:16
text: If anyone sees his brother sinning a sin not leading to death, he shall ask, and God will give him life for those who sin not leading to death. There is a sin leading to death. I don"t say that he should make a request concerning this.

name: 1 John 5:17
text: All unrighteousness is sin, and there is a sin not leading to death.

name: 1 John 5:18
text: We know that whoever is born of God doesn"t sin, but he who was born of God keeps himself, and the evil one doesn"t touch him.

name: 1 John 5:19
text: We know that we are of God, and the whole world lies in the power of the evil one.

name: 1 John 5:20
text: We know that the Son of God has come, and has given us an understanding, that we know him who is true, and we are in him who is true, in his Son Jesus Christ. This is the true God, and eternal life.

name: 1 John 5:21
text: Little children, keep yourselves from idols.

name: 2 John 1:1
text: The elder, to the chosen lady and her children, whom I love in truth; and not I only, but also all those who know the truth;

name: 2 John 1:2
text: for the truth"s sake, which remains in us, and it will be with us forever:

name: 2 John 1:3
text: Grace, mercy, and peace will be with us, from God the Father, and from the Lord Jesus Christ, the Son of the Father, in truth and love.

name: 2 John 1:4
text: I rejoice greatly that I have found some of your children walking in truth, even as we have been commanded by the Father.

name: 2 John 1:5
text: Now I beg you, dear lady, not as though I wrote to you a new commandment, but that which we had from the beginning, that we love one another.

name: 2 John 1:6
text: This is love, that we should walk according to his commandments. This is the commandment, even as you heard from the beginning, that you should walk in it.

name: 2 John 1:7
text: For many deceivers have gone out into the world, those who don"t confess that Jesus Christ came in the flesh. This is the deceiver and the Antichrist.

name: 2 John 1:8
text: Watch yourselves, that we don"t lose the things which we have accomplished, but that we receive a full reward.

name: 2 John 1:9
text: Whoever transgresses and doesn"t remain in the teaching of Christ, doesn"t have God. He who remains in the teaching, the same has both the Father and the Son.

name: 2 John 1:10
text: If anyone comes to you, and doesn"t bring this teaching, don"t receive him into your house, and don"t welcome him,

name: 2 John 1:11
text: for he who welcomes him participates in his evil works.

name: 2 John 1:12
text: Having many things to write to you, I don"t want to do so with paper and ink, but I hope to come to you, and to speak face to face, that our joy may be made full.

name: 2 John 1:13
text: The children of your chosen sister greet you. Amen.

name: 3 John 1:1
text: The elder to Gaius the beloved, whom I love in truth.

name: 3 John 1:2
text: Beloved, I pray that you may prosper in all things and be healthy, even as your soul prospers.

name: 3 John 1:3
text: For I rejoiced greatly, when brothers came and testified about your truth, even as you walk in truth.

name: 3 John 1:4
text: I have no greater joy than this, to hear about my children walking in truth.

name: 3 John 1:5
text: Beloved, you do a faithful work in whatever you accomplish for those who are brothers and strangers.

name: 3 John 1:6
text: They have testified about your love before the assembly. You will do well to send them forward on their journey in a way worthy of God,

name: 3 John 1:7
text: because for the sake of the Name they went out, taking nothing from the Gentiles.

name: 3 John 1:8
text: We therefore ought to receive such, that we may be fellow workers for the truth.

name: 3 John 1:9
text: I wrote to the assembly, but Diotrephes, who loves to be first among them, doesn"t accept what we say.

name: 3 John 1:10
text: Therefore, if I come, I will call attention to his deeds which he does, unjustly accusing us with wicked words. Not content with this, neither does he himself receive the brothers, and those who would, he forbids and throws out of the assembly.

name: 3 John 1:11
text: Beloved, don"t imitate that which is evil, but that which is good. He who does good is of God. He who does evil hasn"t seen God.

name: 3 John 1:12
text: Demetrius has the testimony of all, and of the truth itself; yes, we also testify, and you know that our testimony is true.

name: 3 John 1:13
text: I had many things to write to you, but I am unwilling to write to you with ink and pen;

name: 3 John 1:14
text: but I hope to see you soon, and we will speak face to face. Peace be to you. The friends greet you. Greet the friends by name.

name: Jude 1:1
text: Jude, a servant of Jesus Christ, and brother of James, to those who are called, sanctified by God the Father, and kept for Jesus Christ:

name: Jude 1:2
text: Mercy to you and peace and love be multiplied.

name: Jude 1:3
text: Beloved, while I was very eager to write to you about our common salvation, I was constrained to write to you exhorting you to contend earnestly for the faith which was once for all delivered to the saints.

name: Jude 1:4
text: For there are certain men who crept in secretly, even those who were long ago written about for this condemnation: ungodly men, turning the grace of our God into indecency, and denying our only Master, God, and Lord, Jesus Christ.

name: Jude 1:5
text: Now I desire to remind you, though you already know this, that the Lord, having saved a people out of the land of Egypt, afterward destroyed those who didn"t believe.

name: Jude 1:6
text: Angels who didn"t keep their first domain, but deserted their own dwelling place, he has kept in everlasting bonds under darkness for the judgment of the great day.

name: Jude 1:7
text: Even as Sodom and Gomorrah, and the cities around them, having, in the same way as these, given themselves over to sexual immorality and gone after strange flesh, are set forth as an example, suffering the punishment of eternal fire.

name: Jude 1:8
text: Yet in the same way, these also in their dreaming defile the flesh, despise authority, and slander celestial beings.

name: Jude 1:9
text: But Michael, the archangel, when contending with the devil and arguing about the body of Moses, dared not bring against him an abusive condemnation, but said, "May the Lord rebuke you!"

name: Jude 1:10
text: But these speak evil of whatever things they don"t know. What they understand naturally, like the creatures without reason, they are destroyed in these things.

name: Jude 1:11
text: Woe to them! For they went in the way of Cain, and ran riotously in the error of Balaam for hire, and perished in Korah"s rebellion.

name: Jude 1:12
text: These are hidden rocky reefs in your love feasts when they feast with you, shepherds who without fear feed themselves; clouds without water, carried along by winds; autumn leaves without fruit, twice dead, plucked up by the roots;

name: Jude 1:13
text: wild waves of the sea, foaming out their own shame; wandering stars, for whom the blackness of darkness has been reserved forever.

name: Jude 1:14
text: About these also Enoch, the seventh from Adam, prophesied, saying, "Behold, the Lord came with ten thousands of his holy ones,

name: Jude 1:15
text: to execute judgment on all, and to convict all the ungodly of all their works of ungodliness which they have done in an ungodly way, and of all the hard things which ungodly sinners have spoken against him."

name: Jude 1:16
text: These are murmurers and complainers, walking after their lusts (and their mouth speaks proud things), showing respect of persons to gain advantage.

name: Jude 1:17
text: But you, beloved, remember the words which have been spoken before by the apostles of our Lord Jesus Christ.

name: Jude 1:18
text: They said to you that "In the last time there will be mockers, walking after their own ungodly lusts."

name: Jude 1:19
text: These are they who cause divisions, and are sensual, not having the Spirit.

name: Jude 1:20
text: But you, beloved, keep building up yourselves on your most holy faith, praying in the Holy Spirit.

name: Jude 1:21
text: Keep yourselves in the love of God, looking for the mercy of our Lord Jesus Christ to eternal life.

name: Jude 1:22
text: On some have compassion, making a distinction,

name: Jude 1:23
text: and some save, snatching them out of the fire with fear, hating even the clothing stained by the flesh.

name: Jude 1:24
text: Now to him who is able to keep them from stumbling, and to present you faultless before the presence of his glory in great joy,

name: Jude 1:25
text: to God our Savior, who alone is wise, be glory and majesty, dominion and power, both now and forever. Amen.

name: Revelation 1:1
text: This is the Revelation of Jesus Christ, which God gave him to show to his servants the things which must happen soon, which he sent and made known by his angel to his servant, John,

name: Revelation 1:2
text: who testified to God"s word, and of the testimony of Jesus Christ, about everything that he saw.

name: Revelation 1:3
text: Blessed is he who reads and those who hear the words of the prophecy, and keep the things that are written in it, for the time is at hand.

name: Revelation 1:4
text: John, to the seven assemblies that are in Asia: Grace to you and peace, from God, who is and who was and who is to come; and from the seven Spirits who are before his throne;

name: Revelation 1:5
text: and from Jesus Christ, the faithful witness, the firstborn of the dead, and the ruler of the kings of the earth. To him who loves us, and washed us from our sins by his blood;

name: Revelation 1:6
text: and he made us to be a Kingdom, priests to his God and Father; to him be the glory and the dominion forever and ever. Amen.

name: Revelation 1:7
text: Behold, he is coming with the clouds, and every eye will see him, including those who pierced him. All the tribes of the earth will mourn over him. Even so, Amen.

name: Revelation 1:8
text: "I am the Alpha and the Omega," says the Lord God, "who is and who was and who is to come, the Almighty."

name: Revelation 1:9
text: I John, your brother and partner with you in oppression, Kingdom, and perseverance in Christ Jesus, was on the isle that is called Patmos because of God"s Word and the testimony of Jesus Christ.

name: Revelation 1:10
text: I was in the Spirit on the Lord"s day, and I heard behind me a loud voice, like a trumpet

name: Revelation 1:11
text: saying, "What you see, write in a book and send to the seven assemblies: to Ephesus, Smyrna, Pergamum, Thyatira, Sardis, Philadelphia, and to Laodicea."

name: Revelation 1:12
text: I turned to see the voice that spoke with me. Having turned, I saw seven golden lampstands.

name: Revelation 1:13
text: And among the lampstands was one like a son of man, clothed with a robe reaching down to his feet, and with a golden sash around his chest.

name: Revelation 1:14
text: His head and his hair were white as white wool, like snow. His eyes were like a flame of fire.

name: Revelation 1:15
text: His feet were like burnished brass, as if it had been refined in a furnace. His voice was like the voice of many waters.

name: Revelation 1:16
text: He had seven stars in his right hand. Out of his mouth proceeded a sharp two-edged sword. His face was like the sun shining at its brightest.

name: Revelation 1:17
text: When I saw him, I fell at his feet like a dead man. He laid his right hand on me, saying, "Don"t be afraid. I am the first and the last,

name: Revelation 1:18
text: and the Living one. I was dead, and behold, I am alive forevermore. Amen. I have the keys of Death and of Hades.

name: Revelation 1:19
text: Write therefore the things which you have seen, and the things which are, and the things which will happen hereafter;

name: Revelation 1:20
text: the mystery of the seven stars which you saw in my right hand, and the seven golden lampstands. The seven stars are the angels of the seven assemblies. The seven lampstands are seven assemblies.

name: Revelation 2:1
text: "To the angel of the assembly in Ephesus write: "He who holds the seven stars in his right hand, he who walks among the seven golden lampstands says these things:

name: Revelation 2:2
text: "I know your works, and your toil and perseverance, and that you can"t tolerate evil men, and have tested those who call themselves apostles, and they are not, and found them false.

name: Revelation 2:3
text: You have perseverance and have endured for my name"s sake, and have not grown weary.

name: Revelation 2:4
text: But I have this against you, that you left your first love.

name: Revelation 2:5
text: Remember therefore from where you have fallen, and repent and do the first works; or else I am coming to you swiftly, and will move your lampstand out of its place, unless you repent.

name: Revelation 2:6
text: But this you have, that you hate the works of the Nicolaitans, which I also hate.

name: Revelation 2:7
text: He who has an ear, let him hear what the Spirit says to the assemblies. To him who overcomes I will give to eat of the tree of life, which is in the Paradise of my God.

name: Revelation 2:8
text: "To the angel of the assembly in Smyrna write: "The first and the last, who was dead, and has come to life says these things:

name: Revelation 2:9
text: "I know your works, oppression, and your poverty (but you are rich), and the blasphemy of those who say they are Jews, and they are not, but are a synagogue of Satan.

name: Revelation 2:10
text: Don"t be afraid of the things which you are about to suffer. Behold, the devil is about to throw some of you into prison, that you may be tested; and you will have oppression for ten days. Be faithful to death, and I will give you the crown of life.

name: Revelation 2:11
text: He who has an ear, let him hear what the Spirit says to the assemblies. He who overcomes won"t be harmed by the second death.

name: Revelation 2:12
text: "To the angel of the assembly in Pergamum write: "He who has the sharp two-edged sword says these things:

name: Revelation 2:13
text: "I know your works and where you dwell, where Satan"s throne is. You hold firmly to my name, and didn"t deny my faith in the days of Antipas my witness, my faithful one, who was killed among you, where Satan dwells.

name: Revelation 2:14
text: But I have a few things against you, because you have there some who hold the teaching of Balaam, who taught Balak to throw a stumbling block before the children of Israel, to eat things sacrificed to idols, and to commit sexual immorality.

name: Revelation 2:15
text: So you also have some who hold to the teaching of the Nicolaitans likewise.

name: Revelation 2:16
text: Repent therefore, or else I am coming to you quickly, and I will make war against them with the sword of my mouth.

name: Revelation 2:17
text: He who has an ear, let him hear what the Spirit says to the assemblies. To him who overcomes, to him I will give of the hidden manna, and I will give him a white stone, and on the stone a new name written, which no one knows but he who receives it.

name: Revelation 2:18
text: "To the angel of the assembly in Thyatira write: "The Son of God, who has his eyes like a flame of fire, and his feet are like burnished brass, says these things:

name: Revelation 2:19
text: "I know your works, your love, faith, service, patient endurance, and that your last works are more than the first.

name: Revelation 2:20
text: But I have this against you, that you tolerate your woman, Jezebel, who calls herself a prophetess. She teaches and seduces my servants to commit sexual immorality, and to eat things sacrificed to idols.

name: Revelation 2:21
text: I gave her time to repent, but she refuses to repent of her sexual immorality.

name: Revelation 2:22
text: Behold, I will throw her into a bed, and those who commit adultery with her into great oppression, unless they repent of her works.

name: Revelation 2:23
text: I will kill her children with Death, and all the assemblies will know that I am he who searches the minds and hearts. I will give to each one of you according to your deeds.

name: Revelation 2:24
text: But to you I say, to the rest who are in Thyatira, as many as don"t have this teaching, who don"t know what some call "the deep things of Satan," to you I say, I am not putting any other burden on you.

name: Revelation 2:25
text: Nevertheless, hold that which you have firmly until I come.

name: Revelation 2:26
text: He who overcomes, and he who keeps my works to the end, to him I will give authority over the nations.

name: Revelation 2:27
text: He will rule them with a rod of iron, shattering them like clay pots; as I also have received of my Father:

name: Revelation 2:28
text: and I will give him the morning star.

name: Revelation 2:29
text: He who has an ear, let him hear what the Spirit says to the assemblies.

name: Revelation 3:1
text: "And to the angel of the assembly in Sardis write: "He who has the seven Spirits of God, and the seven stars says these things: "I know your works, that you have a reputation of being alive, but you are dead.

name: Revelation 3:2
text: Wake up, and keep the things that remain, which you were about to throw away, for I have found no works of yours perfected before my God.

name: Revelation 3:3
text: Remember therefore how you have received and heard. Keep it, and repent. If therefore you won"t watch, I will come as a thief, and you won"t know what hour I will come upon you.

name: Revelation 3:4
text: Nevertheless you have a few names in Sardis that did not defile their garments. They will walk with me in white, for they are worthy.

name: Revelation 3:5
text: He who overcomes will be arrayed in white garments, and I will in no way blot his name out of the book of life, and I will confess his name before my Father, and before his angels.

name: Revelation 3:6
text: He who has an ear, let him hear what the Spirit says to the assemblies.

name: Revelation 3:7
text: "To the angel of the assembly in Philadelphia write: "He who is holy, he who is true, he who has the key of David, he who opens and no one can shut, and who shuts and no one opens, says these things:

name: Revelation 3:8
text: "I know your works (behold, I have set before you an open door, which no one can shut), that you have a little power, and kept my word, and didn"t deny my name.

name: Revelation 3:9
text: Behold, I give of the synagogue of Satan, of those who say they are Jews, and they are not, but lie. Behold, I will make them to come and worship before your feet, and to know that I have loved you.

name: Revelation 3:10
text: Because you kept my command to endure, I also will keep you from the hour of testing, which is to come on the whole world, to test those who dwell on the earth.

name: Revelation 3:11
text: I am coming quickly! Hold firmly that which you have, so that no one takes your crown.

name: Revelation 3:12
text: He who overcomes, I will make him a pillar in the temple of my God, and he will go out from there no more. I will write on him the name of my God, and the name of the city of my God, the new Jerusalem, which comes down out of heaven from my God, and my own new name.

name: Revelation 3:13
text: He who has an ear, let him hear what the Spirit says to the assemblies.

name: Revelation 3:14
text: "To the angel of the assembly in Laodicea write: "The Amen, the Faithful and True Witness, the Head of God"s creation, says these things:

name: Revelation 3:15
text: "I know your works, that you are neither cold nor hot. I wish you were cold or hot.

name: Revelation 3:16
text: So, because you are lukewarm, and neither hot nor cold, I will vomit you out of my mouth.

name: Revelation 3:17
text: Because you say, "I am rich, and have gotten riches, and have need of nothing;" and don"t know that you are the wretched one, miserable, poor, blind, and naked;

name: Revelation 3:18
text: I counsel you to buy from me gold refined by fire, that you may become rich; and white garments, that you may clothe yourself, and that the shame of your nakedness may not be revealed; and eye salve to anoint your eyes, that you may see.

name: Revelation 3:19
text: As many as I love, I reprove and chasten. Be zealous therefore, and repent.

name: Revelation 3:20
text: Behold, I stand at the door and knock. If anyone hears my voice and opens the door, then I will come in to him, and will dine with him, and he with me.

name: Revelation 3:21
text: He who overcomes, I will give to him to sit down with me on my throne, as I also overcame, and sat down with my Father on his throne.

name: Revelation 3:22
text: He who has an ear, let him hear what the Spirit says to the assemblies."

name: Revelation 4:1
text: After these things I looked and saw a door opened in heaven, and the first voice that I heard, like a trumpet speaking with me, was one saying, "Come up here, and I will show you the things which must happen after this."

name: Revelation 4:2
text: Immediately I was in the Spirit. Behold, there was a throne set in heaven, and one sitting on the throne

name: Revelation 4:3
text: that looked like a jasper stone and a sardius. There was a rainbow around the throne, like an emerald to look at.

name: Revelation 4:4
text: Around the throne were twenty-four thrones. On the thrones were twenty-four elders sitting, dressed in white garments, with crowns of gold on their heads.

name: Revelation 4:5
text: Out of the throne proceed lightnings, sounds, and thunders. There were seven lamps of fire burning before his throne, which are the seven Spirits of God.

name: Revelation 4:6
text: Before the throne was something like a sea of glass, similar to crystal. In the midst of the throne, and around the throne were four living creatures full of eyes before and behind.

name: Revelation 4:7
text: The first creature was like a lion, and the second creature like a calf, and the third creature had a face like a man, and the fourth was like a flying eagle.

name: Revelation 4:8
text: The four living creatures, each one of them having six wings, are full of eyes around and within. They have no rest day and night, saying, "Holy, holy, holy is the Lord God, the Almighty, who was and who is and who is to come!"

name: Revelation 4:9
text: When the living creatures give glory, honor, and thanks to him who sits on the throne, to him who lives forever and ever,

name: Revelation 4:10
text: the twenty-four elders fall down before him who sits on the throne, and worship him who lives forever and ever, and throw their crowns before the throne, saying,

name: Revelation 4:11
text: "Worthy are you, our Lord and God, the Holy One, to receive the glory, the honor, and the power, for you created all things, and because of your desire they existed, and were created!"

name: Revelation 5:1
text: I saw, in the right hand of him who sat on the throne, a book written inside and outside, sealed shut with seven seals.

name: Revelation 5:2
text: I saw a mighty angel proclaiming with a loud voice, "Who is worthy to open the book, and to break its seals?"

name: Revelation 5:3
text: No one in heaven above, or on the earth, or under the earth, was able to open the book, or to look in it.

name: Revelation 5:4
text: And I wept much, because no one was found worthy to open the book, or to look in it.

name: Revelation 5:5
text: One of the elders said to me, "Don"t weep. Behold, the Lion who is of the tribe of Judah, the Root of David, has overcome; he who opens the book and its seven seals."

name: Revelation 5:6
text: I saw in the midst of the throne and of the four living creatures, and in the midst of the elders, a Lamb standing, as though it had been slain, having seven horns, and seven eyes, which are the seven Spirits of God, sent out into all the earth.

name: Revelation 5:7
text: Then he came, and he took it out of the right hand of him who sat on the throne.

name: Revelation 5:8
text: Now when he had taken the book, the four living creatures and the twenty-four elders fell down before the Lamb, each one having a harp, and golden bowls full of incense, which are the prayers of the saints.

name: Revelation 5:9
text: They sang a new song, saying, "You are worthy to take the book, and to open its seals: for you were killed, and bought us for God with your blood, out of every tribe, language, people, and nation,

name: Revelation 5:10
text: and made us kings and priests to our God, and we will reign on earth."

name: Revelation 5:11
text: I saw, and I heard something like a voice of many angels around the throne, the living creatures, and the elders; and the number of them was ten thousands of ten thousands, and thousands of thousands;

name: Revelation 5:12
text: saying with a loud voice, "Worthy is the Lamb who has been killed to receive the power, wealth, wisdom, strength, honor, glory, and blessing!"

name: Revelation 5:13
text: I heard every created thing which is in heaven, on the earth, under the earth, on the sea, and everything in them, saying, "To him who sits on the throne, and to the Lamb be the blessing, the honor, the glory, and the dominion, forever and ever! Amen!"

name: Revelation 5:14
text: The four living creatures said, "Amen!" The elders fell down and worshiped.

name: Revelation 6:1
text: I saw that the Lamb opened one of the seven seals, and I heard one of the four living creatures saying, as with a voice of thunder, "Come and see!"

name: Revelation 6:2
text: And behold, a white horse, and he who sat on it had a bow. A crown was given to him, and he came forth conquering, and to conquer.

name: Revelation 6:3
text: When he opened the second seal, I heard the second living creature saying, "Come!"

name: Revelation 6:4
text: Another came forth, a red horse. To him who sat on it was given power to take peace from the earth, and that they should kill one another. There was given to him a great sword.

name: Revelation 6:5
text: When he opened the third seal, I heard the third living creature saying, "Come and see!" And behold, a black horse, and he who sat on it had a balance in his hand.

name: Revelation 6:6
text: I heard a voice in the midst of the four living creatures saying, "A choenix of wheat for a denarius, and three choenix of barley for a denarius! Don"t damage the oil and the wine!"

name: Revelation 6:7
text: When he opened the fourth seal, I heard the fourth living creature saying, "Come and see!"

name: Revelation 6:8
text: And behold, a pale horse, and he who sat on it, his name was Death. Hades followed with him. Authority over one fourth of the earth, to kill with the sword, with famine, with death, and by the wild animals of the earth was given to him.

name: Revelation 6:9
text: When he opened the fifth seal, I saw underneath the altar the souls of those who had been killed for the Word of God, and for the testimony of the Lamb which they had.

name: Revelation 6:10
text: They cried with a loud voice, saying, "How long, Master, the holy and true, until you judge and avenge our blood on those who dwell on the earth?"

name: Revelation 6:11
text: A long white robe was given to each of them. They were told that they should rest yet for a while, until their fellow servants and their brothers, who would also be killed even as they were, should complete their course.

name: Revelation 6:12
text: I saw when he opened the sixth seal, and there was a great earthquake. The sun became black as sackcloth made of hair, and the whole moon became as blood.

name: Revelation 6:13
text: The stars of the sky fell to the earth, like a fig tree dropping its unripe figs when it is shaken by a great wind.

name: Revelation 6:14
text: The sky was removed like a scroll when it is rolled up. Every mountain and island were moved out of their places.

name: Revelation 6:15
text: The kings of the earth, the princes, the commanding officers, the rich, the strong, and every slave and free person, hid themselves in the caves and in the rocks of the mountains.

name: Revelation 6:16
text: They told the mountains and the rocks, "Fall on us, and hide us from the face of him who sits on the throne, and from the wrath of the Lamb,

name: Revelation 6:17
text: for the great day of his wrath has come; and who is able to stand?"

name: Revelation 7:1
text: After this, I saw four angels standing at the four corners of the earth, holding the four winds of the earth, so that no wind would blow on the earth, or on the sea, or on any tree.

name: Revelation 7:2
text: I saw another angel ascend from the sunrise, having the seal of the living God. He cried with a loud voice to the four angels to whom it was given to harm the earth and the sea,

name: Revelation 7:3
text: saying, "Don"t harm the earth, neither the sea, nor the trees, until we have sealed the bondservants of our God on their foreheads!"

name: Revelation 7:4
text: I heard the number of those who were sealed, one hundred forty-four thousand, sealed out of every tribe of the children of Israel:

name: Revelation 7:5
text: of the tribe of Judah were sealed twelve thousand, of the tribe of Reuben twelve thousand, of the tribe of Gad twelve thousand,

name: Revelation 7:6
text: of the tribe of Asher twelve thousand, of the tribe of Naphtali twelve thousand, of the tribe of Manasseh twelve thousand,

name: Revelation 7:7
text: of the tribe of Simeon twelve thousand, of the tribe of Levi twelve thousand, of the tribe of Issachar twelve thousand,

name: Revelation 7:8
text: of the tribe of Zebulun twelve thousand, of the tribe of Joseph twelve thousand, of the tribe of Benjamin were sealed twelve thousand.

name: Revelation 7:9
text: After these things I looked, and behold, a great multitude, which no man could number, out of every nation and of all tribes, peoples, and languages, standing before the throne and before the Lamb, dressed in white robes, with palm branches in their hands.

name: Revelation 7:10
text: They cried with a loud voice, saying, "Salvation be to our God, who sits on the throne, and to the Lamb!"

name: Revelation 7:11
text: All the angels were standing around the throne, the elders, and the four living creatures; and they fell on their faces before his throne, and worshiped God,

name: Revelation 7:12
text: saying, "Amen! Blessing, glory, wisdom, thanksgiving, honor, power, and might, be to our God forever and ever! Amen."

name: Revelation 7:13
text: One of the elders answered, saying to me, "These who are arrayed in white robes, who are they, and from where did they come?"

name: Revelation 7:14
text: I told him, "My lord, you know." He said to me, "These are those who came out of the great tribulation. They washed their robes, and made them white in the Lamb"s blood.

name: Revelation 7:15
text: Therefore they are before the throne of God, they serve him day and night in his temple. He who sits on the throne will spread his tabernacle over them.

name: Revelation 7:16
text: They will never be hungry, neither thirsty any more; neither will the sun beat on them, nor any heat;

name: Revelation 7:17
text: for the Lamb who is in the midst of the throne shepherds them, and leads them to springs of waters of life. And God will wipe away every tear from their eyes."

name: Revelation 8:1
text: When he opened the seventh seal, there was silence in heaven for about half an hour.

name: Revelation 8:2
text: I saw the seven angels who stand before God, and seven trumpets were given to them.

name: Revelation 8:3
text: Another angel came and stood over the altar, having a golden censer. Much incense was given to him, that he should add it to the prayers of all the saints on the golden altar which was before the throne.

name: Revelation 8:4
text: The smoke of the incense, with the prayers of the saints, went up before God out of the angel"s hand.

name: Revelation 8:5
text: The angel took the censer, and he filled it with the fire of the altar, and threw it on the earth. There followed thunders, sounds, lightnings, and an earthquake.

name: Revelation 8:6
text: The seven angels who had the seven trumpets prepared themselves to sound.

name: Revelation 8:7
text: The first sounded, and there followed hail and fire, mixed with blood, and they were thrown to the earth. One third of the earth was burnt up, and one third of the trees were burnt up, and all green grass was burnt up.

name: Revelation 8:8
text: The second angel sounded, and something like a great burning mountain was thrown into the sea. One third of the sea became blood,

name: Revelation 8:9
text: and one third of the living creatures which were in the sea died. One third of the ships were destroyed.

name: Revelation 8:10
text: The third angel sounded, and a great star fell from the sky, burning like a torch, and it fell on one third of the rivers, and on the springs of the waters.

name: Revelation 8:11
text: The name of the star is called "Wormwood." One third of the waters became wormwood. Many people died from the waters, because they were made bitter.

name: Revelation 8:12
text: The fourth angel sounded, and one third of the sun was struck, and one third of the moon, and one third of the stars; so that one third of them would be darkened, and the day wouldn"t shine for one third of it, and the night in the same way.

name: Revelation 8:13
text: I saw, and I heard an eagle, flying in mid heaven, saying with a loud voice, "Woe! Woe! Woe for those who dwell on the earth, because of the other voices of the trumpets of the three angels, who are yet to sound!"

name: Revelation 9:1
text: The fifth angel sounded, and I saw a star from the sky which had fallen to the earth. The key to the pit of the abyss was given to him.

name: Revelation 9:2
text: He opened the pit of the abyss, and smoke went up out of the pit, like the smoke from a burning furnace. The sun and the air were darkened because of the smoke from the pit.

name: Revelation 9:3
text: Then out of the smoke came forth locusts on the earth, and power was given to them, as the scorpions of the earth have power.

name: Revelation 9:4
text: They were told that they should not hurt the grass of the earth, neither any green thing, neither any tree, but only those people who don"t have God"s seal on their foreheads.

name: Revelation 9:5
text: They were given power not to kill them, but to torment them for five months. Their torment was like the torment of a scorpion, when it strikes a person.

name: Revelation 9:6
text: In those days people will seek death, and will in no way find it. They will desire to die, and death will flee from them.

name: Revelation 9:7
text: The shapes of the locusts were like horses prepared for war. On their heads were something like golden crowns, and their faces were like people"s faces.

name: Revelation 9:8
text: They had hair like women"s hair, and their teeth were like those of lions.

name: Revelation 9:9
text: They had breastplates, like breastplates of iron. The sound of their wings was like the sound of chariots, or of many horses rushing to war.

name: Revelation 9:10
text: They have tails like those of scorpions, and stings. In their tails they have power to harm men for five months.

name: Revelation 9:11
text: They have over them as king the angel of the abyss. His name in Hebrew is "Abaddon," but in Greek, he has the name "Apollyon."

name: Revelation 9:12
text: The first woe is past. Behold, there are still two woes coming after this.

name: Revelation 9:13
text: The sixth angel sounded. I heard a voice from the horns of the golden altar which is before God,

name: Revelation 9:14
text: saying to the sixth angel who had one trumpet, "Free the four angels who are bound at the great river Euphrates!"

name: Revelation 9:15
text: The four angels were freed who had been prepared for that hour and day and month and year, so that they might kill one third of mankind.

name: Revelation 9:16
text: The number of the armies of the horsemen was two hundred million. I heard the number of them.

name: Revelation 9:17
text: Thus I saw the horses in the vision, and those who sat on them, having breastplates of fiery red, hyacinth blue, and sulfur yellow; and the heads of lions. Out of their mouths proceed fire, smoke, and sulfur.

name: Revelation 9:18
text: By these three plagues were one third of mankind killed: by the fire, the smoke, and the sulfur, which proceeded out of their mouths.

name: Revelation 9:19
text: For the power of the horses is in their mouths, and in their tails. For their tails are like serpents, and have heads, and with them they harm.

name: Revelation 9:20
text: The rest of mankind, who were not killed with these plagues, didn"t repent of the works of their hands, that they wouldn"t worship demons, and the idols of gold, and of silver, and of brass, and of stone, and of wood; which can neither see, nor hear, nor walk.

name: Revelation 9:21
text: They didn"t repent of their murders, nor of their sorceries, nor of their sexual immorality, nor of their thefts.

name: Revelation 10:1
text: I saw a mighty angel coming down out of the sky, clothed with a cloud. A rainbow was on his head. His face was like the sun, and his feet like pillars of fire.

name: Revelation 10:2
text: He had in his hand a little open book. He set his right foot on the sea, and his left on the land.

name: Revelation 10:3
text: He cried with a loud voice, as a lion roars. When he cried, the seven thunders uttered their voices.

name: Revelation 10:4
text: When the seven thunders sounded, I was about to write; but I heard a voice from the sky saying, "Seal up the things which the seven thunders said, and don"t write them."

name: Revelation 10:5
text: The angel whom I saw standing on the sea and on the land lifted up his right hand to the sky,

name: Revelation 10:6
text: and swore by him who lives forever and ever, who created heaven and the things that are in it, the earth and the things that are in it, and the sea and the things that are in it, that there will no longer be delay,

name: Revelation 10:7
text: but in the days of the voice of the seventh angel, when he is about to sound, then the mystery of God is finished, as he declared to his servants, the prophets.

name: Revelation 10:8
text: The voice which I heard from heaven, again speaking with me, said, "Go, take the book which is open in the hand of the angel who stands on the sea and on the land."

name: Revelation 10:9
text: I went to the angel, telling him to give me the little book. He said to me, "Take it, and eat it up. It will make your stomach bitter, but in your mouth it will be as sweet as honey."

name: Revelation 10:10
text: I took the little book out of the angel"s hand, and ate it up. It was as sweet as honey in my mouth. When I had eaten it, my stomach was made bitter.

name: Revelation 10:11
text: They told me, "You must prophesy again over many peoples, nations, languages, and kings."

name: Revelation 11:1
text: A reed like a rod was given to me. Someone said, "Rise, and measure God"s temple, and the altar, and those who worship in it.

name: Revelation 11:2
text: Leave out the court which is outside of the temple, and don"t measure it, for it has been given to the nations. They will tread the holy city under foot for forty-two months.

name: Revelation 11:3
text: I will give power to my two witnesses, and they will prophesy one thousand two hundred sixty days, clothed in sackcloth."

name: Revelation 11:4
text: These are the two olive trees and the two lampstands, standing before the Lord of the earth.

name: Revelation 11:5
text: If anyone desires to harm them, fire proceeds out of their mouth and devours their enemies. If anyone desires to harm them, he must be killed in this way.

name: Revelation 11:6
text: These have the power to shut up the sky, that it may not rain during the days of their prophecy. They have power over the waters, to turn them into blood, and to strike the earth with every plague, as often as they desire.

name: Revelation 11:7
text: When they have finished their testimony, the beast that comes up out of the abyss will make war with them, and overcome them, and kill them.

name: Revelation 11:8
text: Their dead bodies will be in the street of the great city, which spiritually is called Sodom and Egypt, where also their Lord was crucified.

name: Revelation 11:9
text: From among the peoples, tribes, languages, and nations people will look at their dead bodies for three and a half days, and will not allow their dead bodies to be laid in a tomb.

name: Revelation 11:10
text: Those who dwell on the earth rejoice over them, and they will be glad. They will give gifts to one another, because these two prophets tormented those who dwell on the earth.

name: Revelation 11:11
text: After the three and a half days, the breath of life from God entered into them, and they stood on their feet. Great fear fell on those who saw them.

name: Revelation 11:12
text: I heard a loud voice from heaven saying to them, "Come up here!" They went up into heaven in the cloud, and their enemies saw them.

name: Revelation 11:13
text: In that day there was a great earthquake, and a tenth of the city fell. Seven thousand people were killed in the earthquake, and the rest were terrified, and gave glory to the God of heaven.

name: Revelation 11:14
text: The second woe is past. Behold, the third woe comes quickly.

name: Revelation 11:15
text: The seventh angel sounded, and great voices in heaven followed, saying, "The kingdom of the world has become the Kingdom of our Lord, and of his Christ. He will reign forever and ever!"

name: Revelation 11:16
text: The twenty-four elders, who sit on their thrones before God"s throne, fell on their faces and worshiped God,

name: Revelation 11:17
text: saying: "We give you thanks, Lord God, the Almighty, the one who is and who was; because you have taken your great power, and reigned.

name: Revelation 11:18
text: The nations were angry, and your wrath came, as did the time for the dead to be judged, and to give your bondservants the prophets, their reward, as well as to the saints, and those who fear your name, to the small and the great; and to destroy those who destroy the earth."

name: Revelation 11:19
text: God"s temple that is in heaven was opened, and the ark of the Lord"s covenant was seen in his temple. Lightnings, sounds, thunders, an earthquake, and great hail followed.

name: Revelation 12:1
text: A great sign was seen in heaven: a woman clothed with the sun, and the moon under her feet, and on her head a crown of twelve stars.

name: Revelation 12:2
text: She was with child. She cried out in pain, laboring to give birth.

name: Revelation 12:3
text: Another sign was seen in heaven. Behold, a great red dragon, having seven heads and ten horns, and on his heads seven crowns.

name: Revelation 12:4
text: His tail drew one third of the stars of the sky, and threw them to the earth. The dragon stood before the woman who was about to give birth, so that when she gave birth he might devour her child.

name: Revelation 12:5
text: She gave birth to a son, a male child, who is to rule all the nations with a rod of iron. Her child was caught up to God, and to his throne.

name: Revelation 12:6
text: The woman fled into the wilderness, where she has a place prepared by God, that there they may nourish her one thousand two hundred sixty days.

name: Revelation 12:7
text: There was war in the sky. Michael and his angels made war on the dragon. The dragon and his angels made war.

name: Revelation 12:8
text: They didn"t prevail, neither was a place found for him any more in heaven.

name: Revelation 12:9
text: The great dragon was thrown down, the old serpent, he who is called the devil and Satan, the deceiver of the whole world. He was thrown down to the earth, and his angels were thrown down with him.

name: Revelation 12:10
text: I heard a loud voice in heaven, saying, "Now the salvation, the power, and the Kingdom of our God, and the authority of his Christ has come; for the accuser of our brothers has been thrown down, who accuses them before our God day and night.

name: Revelation 12:11
text: They overcame him because of the Lamb"s blood, and because of the word of their testimony. They didn"t love their life, even to death.

name: Revelation 12:12
text: Therefore rejoice, heavens, and you who dwell in them. Woe to the earth and to the sea, because the devil has gone down to you, having great wrath, knowing that he has but a short time."

name: Revelation 12:13
text: When the dragon saw that he was thrown down to the earth, he persecuted the woman who gave birth to the male child.

name: Revelation 12:14
text: Two wings of the great eagle were given to the woman, that she might fly into the wilderness to her place, so that she might be nourished for a time, and times, and half a time, from the face of the serpent.

name: Revelation 12:15
text: The serpent spewed water out of his mouth after the woman like a river, that he might cause her to be carried away by the stream.

name: Revelation 12:16
text: The earth helped the woman, and the earth opened its mouth and swallowed up the river which the dragon spewed out of his mouth.

name: Revelation 12:17
text: The dragon grew angry with the woman, and went away to make war with the rest of her seed, who keep God"s commandments and hold Jesus" testimony.

name: Revelation 13:1
text: Then I stood on the sand of the sea. I saw a beast coming up out of the sea, having ten horns and seven heads. On his horns were ten crowns, and on his heads, blasphemous names.

name: Revelation 13:2
text: The beast which I saw was like a leopard, and his feet were like those of a bear, and his mouth like the mouth of a lion. The dragon gave him his power, his throne, and great authority.

name: Revelation 13:3
text: One of his heads looked like it had been wounded fatally. His fatal wound was healed, and the whole earth marveled at the beast.

name: Revelation 13:4
text: They worshiped the dragon, because he gave his authority to the beast, and they worshiped the beast, saying, "Who is like the beast? Who is able to make war with him?"

name: Revelation 13:5
text: A mouth speaking great things and blasphemy was given to him. Authority to make war for forty-two months was given to him.

name: Revelation 13:6
text: He opened his mouth for blasphemy against God, to blaspheme his name, and his dwelling, those who dwell in heaven.

name: Revelation 13:7
text: It was given to him to make war with the saints, and to overcome them. Authority over every tribe, people, language, and nation was given to him.

name: Revelation 13:8
text: All who dwell on the earth will worship him, everyone whose name has not been written from the foundation of the world in the book of life of the Lamb who has been killed.

name: Revelation 13:9
text: If anyone has an ear, let him hear.

name: Revelation 13:10
text: If anyone is to go into captivity, he will go into captivity. If anyone is to be killed with the sword, he must be killed. Here is the endurance and the faith of the saints.

name: Revelation 13:11
text: I saw another beast coming up out of the earth. He had two horns like a lamb, and he spoke like a dragon.

name: Revelation 13:12
text: He exercises all the authority of the first beast in his presence. He makes the earth and those who dwell in it to worship the first beast, whose fatal wound was healed.

name: Revelation 13:13
text: He performs great signs, even making fire come down out of the sky to the earth in the sight of people.

name: Revelation 13:14
text: He deceives my own people who dwell on the earth because of the signs he was granted to do in front of the beast; saying to those who dwell on the earth, that they should make an image to the beast who had the sword wound and lived.

name: Revelation 13:15
text: It was given to him to give breath to it, to the image of the beast, that the image of the beast should both speak, and cause as many as wouldn"t worship the image of the beast to be killed.

name: Revelation 13:16
text: He causes all, the small and the great, the rich and the poor, and the free and the slave, to be given marks on their right hands, or on their foreheads;

name: Revelation 13:17
text: and that no one would be able to buy or to sell, unless he has that mark, the name of the beast or the number of his name.

name: Revelation 13:18
text: Here is wisdom. He who has understanding, let him calculate the number of the beast, for it is the number of a man. His number is six hundred sixty-six.

name: Revelation 14:1
text: I saw, and behold, the Lamb standing on Mount Zion, and with him a number, one hundred forty-four thousand, having his name, and the name of his Father, written on their foreheads.

name: Revelation 14:2
text: I heard a sound from heaven, like the sound of many waters, and like the sound of a great thunder. The sound which I heard was like that of harpists playing on their harps.

name: Revelation 14:3
text: They sing a new song before the throne, and before the four living creatures and the elders. No one could learn the song except the one hundred forty-four thousand, those who had been redeemed out of the earth.

name: Revelation 14:4
text: These are those who were not defiled with women, for they are virgins. These are those who follow the Lamb wherever he goes. These were redeemed by Jesus from among men, the first fruits to God and to the Lamb.

name: Revelation 14:5
text: In their mouth was found no lie, for they are blameless.

name: Revelation 14:6
text: I saw an angel flying in mid heaven, having an eternal Good News to proclaim to those who dwell on the earth, and to every nation, tribe, language, and people.

name: Revelation 14:7
text: He said with a loud voice, "Fear the Lord, and give him glory; for the hour of his judgment has come. Worship him who made the heaven, the earth, the sea, and the springs of waters!"

name: Revelation 14:8
text: Another, a second angel, followed, saying, "Babylon the great has fallen, which has made all the nations to drink of the wine of the wrath of her sexual immorality."

name: Revelation 14:9
text: Another angel, a third, followed them, saying with a great voice, "If anyone worships the beast and his image, and receives a mark on his forehead, or on his hand,

name: Revelation 14:10
text: he also will drink of the wine of the wrath of God, which is prepared unmixed in the cup of his anger. He will be tormented with fire and sulfur in the presence of the holy angels, and in the presence of the Lamb.

name: Revelation 14:11
text: The smoke of their torment goes up forever and ever. They have no rest day and night, those who worship the beast and his image, and whoever receives the mark of his name.

name: Revelation 14:12
text: Here is the patience of the saints, those who keep the commandments of God, and the faith of Jesus."

name: Revelation 14:13
text: I heard the voice from heaven saying, "Write, "Blessed are the dead who die in the Lord from now on."" "Yes," says the Spirit, "that they may rest from their labors; for their works follow with them."

name: Revelation 14:14
text: I looked, and behold, a white cloud; and on the cloud one sitting like a son of man, having on his head a golden crown, and in his hand a sharp sickle.

name: Revelation 14:15
text: Another angel came out from the temple, crying with a loud voice to him who sat on the cloud, "Send forth your sickle, and reap; for the hour to reap has come; for the harvest of the earth is ripe!"

name: Revelation 14:16
text: He who sat on the cloud thrust his sickle on the earth, and the earth was reaped.

name: Revelation 14:17
text: Another angel came out from the temple which is in heaven. He also had a sharp sickle.

name: Revelation 14:18
text: Another angel came out from the altar, he who has power over fire, and he called with a great voice to him who had the sharp sickle, saying, "Send forth your sharp sickle, and gather the clusters of the vine of the earth, for the earth"s grapes are fully ripe!"

name: Revelation 14:19
text: The angel thrust his sickle into the earth, and gathered the vintage of the earth, and threw it into the great winepress of the wrath of God.

name: Revelation 14:20
text: The winepress was trodden outside of the city, and blood came out from the winepress, even to the bridles of the horses, as far as one thousand six hundred stadia.

name: Revelation 15:1
text: I saw another great and marvelous sign in the sky: seven angels having the seven last plagues, for in them God"s wrath is finished.

name: Revelation 15:2
text: I saw something like a sea of glass mixed with fire, and those who overcame the beast, his image, and the number of his name, standing on the sea of glass, having harps of God.

name: Revelation 15:3
text: They sang the song of Moses, the servant of God, and the song of the Lamb, saying, "Great and marvelous are your works, Lord God, the Almighty! Righteous and true are your ways, you King of the nations.

name: Revelation 15:4
text: Who wouldn"t fear you, Lord, and glorify your name? For you only are holy. For all the nations will come and worship before you. For your righteous acts have been revealed."

name: Revelation 15:5
text: After these things I looked, and the temple of the tabernacle of the testimony in heaven was opened.

name: Revelation 15:6
text: The seven angels who had the seven plagues came out, clothed with pure, bright linen, and wearing golden sashes around their breasts.

name: Revelation 15:7
text: One of the four living creatures gave to the seven angels seven golden bowls full of the wrath of God, who lives forever and ever.

name: Revelation 15:8
text: The temple was filled with smoke from the glory of God, and from his power. No one was able to enter into the temple, until the seven plagues of the seven angels would be finished.

name: Revelation 16:1
text: I heard a loud voice out of the temple, saying to the seven angels, "Go and pour out the seven bowls of the wrath of God on the earth!"

name: Revelation 16:2
text: The first went, and poured out his bowl into the earth, and it became a harmful and evil sore on the people who had the mark of the beast, and who worshiped his image.

name: Revelation 16:3
text: The second angel poured out his bowl into the sea, and it became blood as of a dead man. Every living thing in the sea died.

name: Revelation 16:4
text: The third poured out his bowl into the rivers and springs of water, and they became blood.

name: Revelation 16:5
text: I heard the angel of the waters saying, "You are righteous, who are and who were, you Holy One, because you have judged these things.

name: Revelation 16:6
text: For they poured out the blood of the saints and the prophets, and you have given them blood to drink. They deserve this."

name: Revelation 16:7
text: I heard the altar saying, "Yes, Lord God, the Almighty, true and righteous are your judgments."

name: Revelation 16:8
text: The fourth poured out his bowl on the sun, and it was given to him to scorch men with fire.

name: Revelation 16:9
text: People were scorched with great heat, and people blasphemed the name of God who has the power over these plagues. They didn"t repent and give him glory.

name: Revelation 16:10
text: The fifth poured out his bowl on the throne of the beast, and his kingdom was darkened. They gnawed their tongues because of the pain,

name: Revelation 16:11
text: and they blasphemed the God of heaven because of their pains and their sores. They didn"t repent of their works.

name: Revelation 16:12
text: The sixth poured out his bowl on the great river, the Euphrates. Its water was dried up, that the way might be prepared for the kings that come from the sunrise.

name: Revelation 16:13
text: I saw coming out of the mouth of the dragon, and out of the mouth of the beast, and out of the mouth of the false prophet, three unclean spirits, something like frogs;

name: Revelation 16:14
text: for they are spirits of demons, performing signs; which go forth to the kings of the whole inhabited earth, to gather them together for the war of that great day of God, the Almighty.

name: Revelation 16:15
text: "Behold, I come like a thief. Blessed is he who watches, and keeps his clothes, so that he doesn"t walk naked, and they see his shame."

name: Revelation 16:16
text: He gathered them together into the place which is called in Hebrew, Megiddo.

name: Revelation 16:17
text: The seventh poured out his bowl into the air. A loud voice came forth out of the temple of heaven, from the throne, saying, "It is done!"

name: Revelation 16:18
text: There were lightnings, sounds, and thunders; and there was a great earthquake, such as was not since there were men on the earth, so great an earthquake, so mighty.

name: Revelation 16:19
text: The great city was divided into three parts, and the cities of the nations fell. Babylon the great was remembered in the sight of God, to give to her the cup of the wine of the fierceness of his wrath.

name: Revelation 16:20
text: Every island fled away, and the mountains were not found.

name: Revelation 16:21
text: Great hailstones, about the weight of a talent, came down out of the sky on people. People blasphemed God because of the plague of the hail, for this plague is exceedingly severe.

name: Revelation 17:1
text: One of the seven angels who had the seven bowls came and spoke with me, saying, "Come here. I will show you the judgment of the great prostitute who sits on many waters,

name: Revelation 17:2
text: with whom the kings of the earth committed sexual immorality, and those who dwell in the earth were made drunken with the wine of her sexual immorality."

name: Revelation 17:3
text: He carried me away in the Spirit into a wilderness. I saw a woman sitting on a scarlet-colored animal, full of blasphemous names, having seven heads and ten horns.

name: Revelation 17:4
text: The woman was dressed in purple and scarlet, and decked with gold and precious stones and pearls, having in her hand a golden cup full of abominations and the impurities of the sexual immorality of the earth.

name: Revelation 17:5
text: And on her forehead a name was written, "MYSTERY, BABYLON THE GREAT, THE MOTHER OF THE PROSTITUTES AND OF THE ABOMINATIONS OF THE EARTH."

name: Revelation 17:6
text: I saw the woman drunken with the blood of the saints, and with the blood of the martyrs of Jesus. When I saw her, I wondered with great amazement.

name: Revelation 17:7
text: The angel said to me, "Why do you wonder? I will tell you the mystery of the woman, and of the beast that carries her, which has the seven heads and the ten horns.

name: Revelation 17:8
text: The beast that you saw was, and is not; and is about to come up out of the abyss and to go into destruction. Those who dwell on the earth and whose names have not been written in the book of life from the foundation of the world will marvel when they see that the beast was, and is not, and shall be present.

name: Revelation 17:9
text: Here is the mind that has wisdom. The seven heads are seven mountains, on which the woman sits.

name: Revelation 17:10
text: They are seven kings. Five have fallen, the one is, the other has not yet come. When he comes, he must continue a little while.

name: Revelation 17:11
text: The beast that was, and is not, is himself also an eighth, and is of the seven; and he goes to destruction.

name: Revelation 17:12
text: The ten horns that you saw are ten kings who have received no kingdom as yet, but they receive authority as kings, with the beast, for one hour.

name: Revelation 17:13
text: These have one mind, and they give their power and authority to the beast.

name: Revelation 17:14
text: These will war against the Lamb, and the Lamb will overcome them, for he is Lord of lords, and King of kings. They also will overcome who are with him, called and chosen and faithful."

name: Revelation 17:15
text: He said to me, "The waters which you saw, where the prostitute sits, are peoples, multitudes, nations, and languages.

name: Revelation 17:16
text: The ten horns which you saw, and the beast, these will hate the prostitute, and will make her desolate, and will make her naked, and will eat her flesh, and will burn her utterly with fire.

name: Revelation 17:17
text: For God has put in their hearts to do what he has in mind, and to be of one mind, and to give their kingdom to the beast, until the words of God should be accomplished.

name: Revelation 17:18
text: The woman whom you saw is the great city, which reigns over the kings of the earth."

name: Revelation 18:1
text: After these things, I saw another angel coming down out of the sky, having great authority. The earth was illuminated with his glory.

name: Revelation 18:2
text: He cried with a mighty voice, saying, "Fallen, fallen is Babylon the great, and she has become a habitation of demons, a prison of every unclean spirit, and a prison of every unclean and hateful bird!

name: Revelation 18:3
text: For all the nations have drunk of the wine of the wrath of her sexual immorality, the kings of the earth committed sexual immorality with her, and the merchants of the earth grew rich from the abundance of her luxury."

name: Revelation 18:4
text: I heard another voice from heaven, saying, "Come out of her, my people, that you have no participation in her sins, and that you don"t receive of her plagues,

name: Revelation 18:5
text: for her sins have reached to the sky, and God has remembered her iniquities.

name: Revelation 18:6
text: Return to her just as she returned, and repay her double as she did, and according to her works. In the cup which she mixed, mix to her double.

name: Revelation 18:7
text: However much she glorified herself, and grew wanton, so much give her of torment and mourning. For she says in her heart, "I sit a queen, and am no widow, and will in no way see mourning."

name: Revelation 18:8
text: Therefore in one day her plagues will come: death, mourning, and famine; and she will be utterly burned with fire; for the Lord God who has judged her is strong.

name: Revelation 18:9
text: The kings of the earth, who committed sexual immorality and lived wantonly with her, will weep and wail over her, when they look at the smoke of her burning,

name: Revelation 18:10
text: standing far away for the fear of her torment, saying, "Woe, woe, the great city, Babylon, the strong city! For your judgment has come in one hour."

name: Revelation 18:11
text: The merchants of the earth weep and mourn over her, for no one buys their merchandise any more;

name: Revelation 18:12
text: merchandise of gold, silver, precious stones, pearls, fine linen, purple, silk, scarlet, all expensive wood, every vessel of ivory, every vessel made of most precious wood, and of brass, and iron, and marble;

name: Revelation 18:13
text: and cinnamon, incense, perfume, frankincense, wine, olive oil, fine flour, wheat, sheep, horses, chariots, and people"s bodies and souls.

name: Revelation 18:14
text: The fruits which your soul lusted after have been lost to you, and all things that were dainty and sumptuous have perished from you, and you will find them no more at all.

name: Revelation 18:15
text: The merchants of these things, who were made rich by her, will stand far away for the fear of her torment, weeping and mourning;

name: Revelation 18:16
text: saying, "Woe, woe, the great city, she who was dressed in fine linen, purple, and scarlet, and decked with gold and precious stones and pearls!

name: Revelation 18:17
text: For in an hour such great riches are made desolate." Every shipmaster, and everyone who sails anywhere, and mariners, and as many as gain their living by sea, stood far away,

name: Revelation 18:18
text: and cried out as they looked at the smoke of her burning, saying, "What is like the great city?"

name: Revelation 18:19
text: They cast dust on their heads, and cried, weeping and mourning, saying, "Woe, woe, the great city, in which all who had their ships in the sea were made rich by reason of her great wealth!" For in one hour is she made desolate.

name: Revelation 18:20
text: "Rejoice over her, O heaven, you saints, apostles, and prophets; for God has judged your judgment on her."

name: Revelation 18:21
text: A mighty angel took up a stone like a great millstone and cast it into the sea, saying, "Thus with violence will Babylon, the great city, be thrown down, and will be found no more at all.

name: Revelation 18:22
text: The voice of harpists, minstrels, flute players, and trumpeters will be heard no more at all in you. No craftsman, of whatever craft, will be found any more at all in you. The sound of a mill will be heard no more at all in you.

name: Revelation 18:23
text: The light of a lamp will shine no more at all in you. The voice of the bridegroom and of the bride will be heard no more at all in you; for your merchants were the princes of the earth; for with your sorcery all the nations were deceived.

name: Revelation 18:24
text: In her was found the blood of prophets and of saints, and of all who have been slain on the earth."

name: Revelation 19:1
text: After these things I heard something like a loud voice of a great multitude in heaven, saying, "Hallelujah! Salvation, power, and glory belong to our God:

name: Revelation 19:2
text: for true and righteous are his judgments. For he has judged the great prostitute, who corrupted the earth with her sexual immorality, and he has avenged the blood of his servants at her hand."

name: Revelation 19:3
text: A second said, "Hallelujah! Her smoke goes up forever and ever."

name: Revelation 19:4
text: The twenty-four elders and the four living creatures fell down and worshiped God who sits on the throne, saying, "Amen! Hallelujah!"

name: Revelation 19:5
text: A voice came forth from the throne, saying, "Give praise to our God, all you his servants, you who fear him, the small and the great!"

name: Revelation 19:6
text: I heard something like the voice of a great multitude, and like the voice of many waters, and like the voice of mighty thunders, saying, "Hallelujah! For the Lord our God, the Almighty, reigns!

name: Revelation 19:7
text: Let us rejoice and be exceedingly glad, and let us give the glory to him. For the marriage of the Lamb has come, and his wife has made herself ready."

name: Revelation 19:8
text: It was given to her that she would array herself in bright, pure, fine linen: for the fine linen is the righteous acts of the saints.

name: Revelation 19:9
text: He said to me, "Write, "Blessed are those who are invited to the marriage supper of the Lamb."" He said to me, "These are true words of God."

name: Revelation 19:10
text: I fell down before his feet to worship him. He said to me, "Look! Don"t do it! I am a fellow bondservant with you and with your brothers who hold the testimony of Jesus. Worship God, for the testimony of Jesus is the Spirit of Prophecy."

name: Revelation 19:11
text: I saw the heaven opened, and behold, a white horse, and he who sat on it is called Faithful and True. In righteousness he judges and makes war.

name: Revelation 19:12
text: His eyes are a flame of fire, and on his head are many crowns. He has names written and a name written which no one knows but he himself.
